text: athava aapake lie sone ka ek ghar ho jaaye athava aakaash mein chadh jaayen aur ham aapake chadhane ka bhee kadaapi vishvaas nahin karenge, yahaan tak kee hamapar ek pustak utaar laayen, jise ham padhen. aap kah den ki mera paalanahaar pavitr hai, mainto bas ek rasool (sandeshavaahak) manushy[1] hoon
